ComicInfo.Title: [Untitled]; Escape From Junk Rat Island
ComicInfo.Summary:
The time has finally come…or really, the Bravest Warriors are out of time. With their chances slowly dwindling, these friends have to put their heads together to figure out a way to save their best bud Chris before it’s too late.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Angelica Russell | 1 | B | Cover B | Jordyn Bochon | 2 | C | Cover C | Bridget Underwood | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-09 07:48:23. [CVDB466372]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Angelica Russell, Bridget Underwood, Jordyn Bochon
ComicInfo.Editor: Cameron Chittock, Rebecca Taylor, Shannon Watters, Whitney Leopard
ComicInfo.Characters: Beth Tezuka, Catbug, Chris Kirkman, Danny Vasquez, Impossibear, Plum, Robo Chris, Wallow
